author: Add00
description:
Conditions, actions and expressions to use regular expressions with strings, such as:  
- Find the position of pattern in a string 
- Find a pattern in a string
- Split a string by a pattern
- Check if a string matches a pattern
- Replace patterns in a string with another string
name: RegEx

eventsFunctions.name: HasPattern

parameters.description: The string to check for a pattern
parameters.name: string

eventsFunctions.fullName: Split a string into an array
eventsFunctions.name: Split

parameters.description: The string to split by the pattern
parameters.name: string

parameters.description: The name of the variable to store the result in
parameters.name: variable

parameters.description: The name of the variable to store the result in
